original_text: My sheep do not have any shepherds to take care of them. So they are not safe from danger. They have become food for all the wild animals. You, my shepherds, have not gone to look for the sheep that were lost. You only wanted to help yourselves instead of my sheep. So I, the Almighty Lord, promise you this, as surely as I live.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀에 내가 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노라 내 양 떼가 노략 거리가 되고 모든 들짐승의 밥이 된 것은 목자가 없기 때문이라 내 목자들이 내 양을 찾지 아니하고 자기만 먹이고 내 양 떼를 먹이지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: My sheep do not have any shepherds
So they are not safe from danger
They have become food for all the wild animals
You, my shepherds, have not gone to look for the sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 나의 목자들은 잃어버린 양들을 찾으러 가지 않았다
길 잃은 양들을 찾으러 가지 않았다

sentences.original_text: You only wanted to help yourselves instead of my sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내 양 대신 자신들을 돕기만 원했다

sentences.original_text: So I, the Almighty Lord, promise you this
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내, 전능하신 주께서 너희에게 이것을 약속한다
